findings.title: Test code present in the code base
findings.description: Test code is present in the code base.

findings.title: FreezerAddress has more power than required
findings.description: _FreezerAddress is designed to have the ability of freezing the contract in case of emergency.
findings.location: FreezerAddress functionality, ReversibleICO.sol, Freeze function and others

findings.title: frozenPeriod is subtracted twice for calculating the current price
findings.description: If the contract had been frozen, the current stage price will calculate the price by subtracting the same number again.
findings.location: Price calculation function, ReversibleICO.sol:L617足L619, L711足L714, and L654足L656

findings.title: Lockup condition in getStageAtBlock()
findings.description: Given that the contract has been frozen at least once, if the frozenPeriod is longer than the period, the following require in getStageAtBlock() will revert.

findings.title: Inadequate use of events
findings.description: Events are useful for UI changes and user notifications. The code base overall can use more use of events to update the UI and participants.
findings.location: rICO contract, freeze(), unfreeze(), disableEscapeHatch(), escapeHatch() functions
